Translations.Text: A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik: "maday teb$amt tameddurt n ddunit, akked ccbue is, yyamt a kwent $ite$, ad a kwent bru$, berru umain
Ma illa teb$amt Oebbi, Amazan iS, akked uxxam aneggaru, ihi, Ihegga d Oebbi, i taaoviyin, segkwent, arraz ameqwoaean
A tilawin n Nnbi! Tid segkwent ara iawin abekkav ufvie, a ppeppuaaqeb berdayen. Ayagi d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
Tin segkwent i iunzen i Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, u txeddem ayen ilhan, ad as Nefk arraz berdayen, u Nhegga yas d l$it ukyis
A tilawin n Nnbi! Ur tellimt am tlawin nniven. Ma teezzbemt, ur teppeccvemt deg wawal, a kwent isirem umuvin n wul. Inimt awal uwqim

Ilimt deg ixxamen nnkwent. Ur pcebbieemt acebbee n at war tussna imenza. eEealemt, zekkimt, oavimt Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ib$a kan Oebbi a kwent ipwakkes nnkel, a tawacult n Uxxam. U, a kwent Izzizdeg nezzeh
Mmektitemt ed ayen i kwent $oan, deg ixxamen nnkwent, n issekniyen n Oebbi, akw n uuwab. Ih, Oebbi Izga d Laiif, Ippuxebbeo
